ast.name: Gist Fox API
ast.description:
Gist Fox API is a **pastes service** similar to [GitHub's Gist](http://gist.github.com).

## Authentication

Currently the Gist Fox API does not provide authenticated access.

## Media Types

Where applicable this API uses the [HAL+JSON](https://github.com/mikekelly/hal_specification/blob/master/hal_specification.md) media-type to represent resources states and affordances.

Requests with a message-body are using plain JSON to set or update resource states.

## Error States

The common [HTTP Response Status Codes](https://github.com/for-GET/know-your-http-well/blob/master/status-codes.md) are used.

resources.name: Gist Fox API Root
resources.description:
Gist Fox API entry point.

This resource does not have any attributes. Instead it offers the initial API affordances in the form of the HTTP Link header and
HAL links.

resources.name: Gist
resources.description:
A single Gist object. The Gist resource is the central resource in the Gist Fox API. It represents one paste - a single text note.

The Gist resource has the following attributes:

+ id

+ created_at

+ description

+ content

The states *id* and *created_at* are assigned by the Gist Fox API at the moment of creation.

model.name: Gist
model.description: HAL+JSON representation of Gist Resource. In addition to representing its state in the JSON form it offers affordances in the form of the HTTP Link header and HAL links.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Gist in the form of a hash.

responses.description: HAL+JSON representation of Gist Resource. In addition to representing its state in the JSON form it offers affordances in the form of the HTTP Link header and HAL links.

actions.name: Edit a Gist
actions.description: To update a Gist send a JSON with updated value for one or more of the Gist resource attributes. All attributes values (states) from the previous version of this Gist are carried over by default if not included in the hash.

responses.description: HAL+JSON representation of Gist Resource. In addition to representing its state in the JSON form it offers affordances in the form of the HTTP Link header and HAL links.

resources.name: Gists Collection
resources.description:
Collection of all Gists.

The Gist Collection resource has the following attribute:

+ total

In addition it **embeds** *Gist Resources* in the Gist Fox API.

model.name: Gists Collection
model.description: HAL+JSON representation of Gist Collection Resource. The Gist resources in collections are embedded. Note the embedded Gists resource are incomplete representations of the Gist in question. Use the respective Gist link to retrieve its full representation.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Timestamp in ISO 8601 format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ` Only gists updated at or after this time are returned.

responses.description: HAL+JSON representation of Gist Collection Resource. The Gist resources in collections are embedded. Note the embedded Gists resource are incomplete representations of the Gist in question. Use the respective Gist link to retrieve its full representation.

actions.name: Create a Gist
actions.description: To create a new Gist simply provide a JSON hash of the *description* and *content* attributes for the new Gist.

responses.description: HAL+JSON representation of Gist Resource. In addition to representing its state in the JSON form it offers affordances in the form of the HTTP Link header and HAL links.

resources.name: Star
resources.description:
Star resource represents a Gist starred status.

The Star resource has the following attribute:

+ starred

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the gist in the form of a hash

actions.name: Check if a Gist is Starred
